title: Chrome Web Store will show badges for reputable developers and extensions [Update: Official]
content:
The Chrome Web Store is Google’s repository of extensions and themes for the Chrome web browser, which has had repeated issues with malicious extensions. The post Chrome Web Store will show badges for reputable developers and extensions [Update: Official] appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is rolling out two public badges on the Chrome Web Store to help people find high-quality and trustworthy extensions.
